EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 43 PERSONS ON BOARD, ADRIFT
IN VICINITY 33-47.00N 018-19.00E AT 130337Z NOV.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
E-MAIL: LCG.OPS.RM@MOD.GOV.LY,
LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY, LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY,
OR MRCC ROME,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
